lines.text: Okay, I know I brought this up before, as a joke, but...
What if the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> is just allergic to goats?
Maybe he's not breathing because he had an allergic reaction to the goat, and hives closed up his throat!
And your theory is about how he <c=#FF00FF>faked</c> his death.
Well, I'm not 100% committed to that...
And why would he keep a goat in his place if he was allergic?
To say nothin' of how it killed him from across the room.
You're just afraid to think outside the box!
